#labels Phase-Deploy
= Install =
 * Install [http://www.python.org/ Python]
 * Install [https://pypi.python.org/pypi/Shapely Shapley]
  * There are Ubuntu and Debian official package
 * Install [http://www.wxpython.org/ wxPython] for GUI version
  * There are Ubuntu and Debian official package
 * Install [http://matplotlib.org/ matplotlib] for CUI version
  * There are Ubuntu and Debian official package
 * Download [https://sourceforge.net/projects/pygerber2gcode/files/current/ pygerber2gcodeXX.zip] from Sourceforge.
 * Uncompress the file
 * Run the program by "python pygerber2gcode.py"
  * CUI:"python pygerber2gcode_cui.py config_file"
